document.full_text: american jazz bassist and singer esperanza spalding showcased her grammy-winning talent for enthusiastic swiss jazz lovers at the start of a european tour that will also take her to italy, france, britain and spain.
document.title: esperanza spalding brings grammy-winning jazz to europe
lines_and_colors: american jazz bassist and singer esperanza spalding showcased her grammy-winning talent for enthusiastic swiss jazz lovers at the start of a european tour that will also take her to italy, france, britain and spain.
